thread.title: Bolstered by polls, Team Trump attacks Clinton, says Americans understand illegal immigration plan
thread.title_full: Bolstered by polls, Team Trump attacks Clinton, says Americans understand illegal immigration plan | Fox News

author: PeterSkell
text:
Even with the recent poll gains, Trump is trailing Hillary by 85 electoral votes across the key swing states. It's not that it's an RCP 4% or 3% behind Hillary... it's how it breaks down to electoral colleges.
And no, Americans don't understand his illegal immigration plan. To his base it's "amnesty by another name" and to independents/moderates it is beginning of "Kristallnacht" for illegals.
The Trump campaign is a mess and the worst of worlds to undecideds.
Once the debates start (if they start - he still hasn't fully confirmed), it will be game over.
